CustomField.formula: (( Buy_No_of_trips_per_month__c * Buy_Distance_in_KM__c )*( Buy_Cost_of_Fuel_per_litre__c / Buy_Fuel_Avg_in_LtrHr__c))+ Buy_Tyres_Cost__c+ Buy_CleanerOperator_Salary__c + Buy_Drivers_Salary__c + Buy_Taxes_Permit__c + Buy_Maintenance_Cost__c + Buy_Misc_Exps__c + Buy_Proposed_Emi__c
CustomField.label: Total Expenses
